application.summary: real time strategy game with globs

description.p: Globulation 2 is a real time strategy (RTS) game where you use three types of globs: workers, scouts, and warriors to wage war on computer controlled communites of other globs. Globulation is unique from other RTS games in that it removes a lot of the micromanagement from the gameplay. You cannot control the globs directly, only place buildings and let the globs do what they do best.
